title: Manassas National Battlefield Park: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids              For Kids          Manassas National Battlefield is pleased to announce the introduction of two TRACK Trails here at the park!  Come by and take a hike on the Stone Bridge Trail or explore the Brownsville Picnic Area with the help of self-guided brochures you can explore the natural history of the park.  The Stone Bridge TRACK Trail features the first ever cell-phone guided brochure experience and is available in Spanish!   Click here for more information on TRACK Trails for Kids!
